;Added 060905 ~ Tropod
;orthogonal rail + intersection,diagonal lightrail

;rail dead end,diagonal lightrail
;1a

TYPE2=0x00000002,0x01000003,0x5F871900,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000200,0x00000301,0x5F871900,2,0
TYPE4=0x00020000,0x00030100,0x5F871900,3,0
;1b

TYPE4=0x00020000,0x03010000,0x5F871900,1,1

;
;
;orthogonal x diagonal, orthogonal
;does not work as needed
;TYPE1=0x02030100,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x01000203,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x02030200,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x02000203,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;diagonalxdiagonal,orthogonal
;does not work ~ only simple RUL flags allowed.
;TYPE1=0x23622100,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x21002362,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;works, but overhead network needs to be built first & some sort of minor issue exists preventing the drawing of one diagonal direction completely through the junction
;TYPE1=0x03010100,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x01000301,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x03030100,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x01000303,0x00020002,0x12345678,0,0
;
;~~added by Tarkus 12/31/2010
;draggable RAM Set2
TYPE1=0x02000200,0x00010100,0x5d300100,2,0
TYPE2=0x00020002,0x01010000,0x5d300100,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000200,0x01000001,0x5d300100,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020002,0x00000101,0x5d300100,1,0

TYPE1a=0x02000000,0x00010100,0x5d300100,0,0
TYPE1b=0x00020000,0x00010100,0x5d300100,1,0
TYPE1c=0x00000200,0x00010100,0x5d300100,2,0
TYPE1d=0x00000002,0x00010100,0x5d300100,3,0

TYPE2d=0x00000002,0x01010000,0x5d300100,3,0

TYPE3=0x00000001,0x01010000,0x5d302100,2,0
TYPE4=0x01000000,0x00010100,0x5d302100,1,0
